full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 86 of 262 1791 LC8Cmax3 Hesse - direct 1 look for tab 1B. 2 MS. MOE: Your Honor, I would respectfully request 3 that the jury be permitted to turn to Government Exhibit 1B in 4 their binders. 5 THE COURT: Okay. Mr. Pagliuca, 1B? 6 MR. PAGLIUCA: No objection, your Honor. 7 8 THE COURT: You may turn to 1B in the large binder, 9 please. 10 MS. MOE: Just to clarify, it's the smaller of the two 11 binders. Apologies for all the binders. 12 THE COURT: Sorry. 13 MS. MOE: That's my mistake, your Honor. 14 THE COURT: I think we're missing -- 15 MS. MOE: Thank you. 16 BY MS. MOE: 17 Q. Mrs. Hesse, are you now looking at what's in evidence as 18 Government Exhibit 1B? 19 A. I can't find the B. 20 MS. MOE: May I have just one moment to help? 21 THE COURT: Yes. 22 MS. MOE: Thank you. 23 A. Yes, I have it now. 24 Q. Mrs. Hesse, I want to ask you some questions about 25 Government Exhibit 1B, but I want to be very careful not to 26 read out any names out loud. 27 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00013364
